name: Momodora
notes: Download the game from https://rdein.itch.io/momodora-i and feed the archive into the Lutris installer.

files.game_archive: N/A:Please select the game archive downloaded from https://rdein.itch.io/momodora-i

content:
files:
- game_archive: N/A:Please select the game archive downloaded from https://rdein.itch.io/momodora-i
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Momo1_151/Momodora 1.51/momo1_v151.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: $game_archive
